text:
ce="preserve">WWE No Way Out is a yearly pay-per-view made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). The event is usually produced in February and is typically the last pay-per-view before WrestleMania. The first "No Way Out" event was in 1998 as an In Your House event, called. The event did not take place in 1999, 2010 or 2011 but was brought back in 2000 and 2012.
Events.
"Note: (c) - Refers to the champion before the match occurred."
